about_the_game:
Join The Rounders, a strange team of heroes created by 'The Essence', known as the Power of Will.

The team, led by Azulya, known simply as 'The Goddess', will join a spiritual training in the realms of Azuryum, a parallel dimension found by Azulya.

The training purpose is to test their Will and Soul, a really hard training only a 'True Rounder' can complete.

Help them overcome all the obstacles abroad the way, and beat all the challenges.

Rounders (Arena) is a 2D Platform Game that challenges you every second, luck is your friend, more luck you have, more are the chances to proceed in your journey.

Discover all the secrets and beat the game.



FEATURES :

- 100 UNIQUE STAGES !

- 01 PLAYER ARENA MODE - TRY TO BEAT THE ARENAS ALONE AND DEFEAT THE MONSTERS ALONG THE WAY !

- 04 PLAYER BATTLE MODE - CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS TO A MATCH WHERE THE BEST RULES THE REST !

- BOSSES - THEY WILL DO EVERYTHING IN THEIR POWER JUST TO MAKE YOU DIE !

- 05 DIFFERENT CHARACTERS WITH THEIR OWN UNIQUE POWERS !

- DYNAMIC PASSWORD SYSTEM ! - USE THE TIME MACHINE TO BACK IN TIME TO A PREVIOUSLY RECORDED TIME ! - DON'T FORGET TO WRITE IT ON A PAPER BECAUSE YOU'LL HAVE TO REMEMBER THE TIME CODEX ! (DON'T WORRY, YOU'LL KNOW MORE ABOUT IT )

- FIND THE HIDDEN TIME SPOTS TO RECORD TIME !

- LUCK IS YOUR FRIEND !
detailed_description:
Join The Rounders, a strange team of heroes created by 'The Essence', known as the Power of Will.

The team, led by Azulya, known simply as 'The Goddess', will join a spiritual training in the realms of Azuryum, a parallel dimension found by Azulya.

The training purpose is to test their Will and Soul, a really hard training only a 'True Rounder' can complete.

Help them overcome all the obstacles abroad the way, and beat all the challenges.

Rounders (Arena) is a 2D Platform Game that challenges you every second, luck is your friend, more luck you have, more are the chances to proceed in your journey.

Discover all the secrets and beat the game.



FEATURES :

- 100 UNIQUE STAGES !

- 01 PLAYER ARENA MODE - TRY TO BEAT THE ARENAS ALONE AND DEFEAT THE MONSTERS ALONG THE WAY !

- 04 PLAYER BATTLE MODE - CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS TO A MATCH WHERE THE BEST RULES THE REST !

- BOSSES - THEY WILL DO EVERYTHING IN THEIR POWER JUST TO MAKE YOU DIE !

- 05 DIFFERENT CHARACTERS WITH THEIR OWN UNIQUE POWERS !

- DYNAMIC PASSWORD SYSTEM ! - USE THE TIME MACHINE TO BACK IN TIME TO A PREVIOUSLY RECORDED TIME ! - DON'T FORGET TO WRITE IT ON A PAPER BECAUSE YOU'LL HAVE TO REMEMBER THE TIME CODEX ! (DON'T WORRY, YOU'LL KNOW MORE ABOUT IT )

- FIND THE HIDDEN TIME SPOTS TO RECORD TIME !

- LUCK IS YOUR FRIEND !
name: Rounders (Arena)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB

short_description: Rounders (Arena) is a 2D 01-04 Player (Local) Arena Platformer Game. Inspired by the "Easy to learn, hard to master'' mechanics from the old games. Join the team, and prove yourself worthy of the 'True Rounder' title.
